@BD will you add dificulty to ai? and could you ad rols to ai like Bomber/Interceptor/AAA/(Suiciderammer )/Tank/etc.

He makes for us coding Gold, and we then ask for platinum? I'm just playing

To be honest, it would not be that hard to make preset roles in the weapons manager. Just like how you select what weapon to use for guard mode, you select what role you want. Each role would have different parameters (target priority, max roll and yaw value, weapon choice, etc). He already says you can tweak the AI behavior somehow, the roles would just be presets of those behaviors.

Guess I still need help. While the gun works just like it should, it's mouse tracking behavior is quite strange.

Check your aimRotate and aimPitch are pointing the right way. This caught me out.
